original_title: 2003 Sound Horizon Pico Magic CD Pleasure
overview: 1st Pleasure CD "Pico Magic" (May 4, 2003)  1. Onegai! Pico Majin / Please! Piko Genie ☆  2. PicoDJ ☆ / PicoDJ ☆  3. Shijin Ballad no Higeki / The tragedy of the poet Ballad  4. Tadoritsuku Uta / Poetry to reach  5. Raijin no Keifu / Genealogy of Raijin  6. Ark (Pico Magic ver.)  7. Majo to Lafrenze [Pico Magic Ver.] / Witch and Lafrenze (Pico Magic ver.)  8. Mahoutsukai Sarabanto  9. Koibito wo Uchiotoshita Hi / The day when I shot my lover  10. Giniro no Basha / Silver carriage  11. Thanatos no Gensou wa Owaranai ... / The illusion of Tanatos never ends
title: 2003 Sound Horizon Pico Magic CD Pleasure
